objects.text:
• High Definition Stereo Sound
• Comfortable Over-Ear Design
• Built-in Microphone for Calls

product_details.description: Noise Reduction Technology: High Definition Stereo Headphones, noise reduction technology designed to reduce surrounding noise so that you can enjoy what you want to hear. Lose yourself in music even in the lowest volume levels! 40mm sound driver for true richness in sound and deep bass. EASY CONNECTIVITY: Gabba Goods Headphones are compatible with all Bluetooth or 3.5mm plug cable enabled devices such as , iPhones, Smart android phones, Tablet, Laptop, iPads, MP3/4 Player, Computers, MacBook and other Bluetooth devices. Just slide the on/off button and the headphones will be in ready to pair mode. It is built to provide a quick and stable Bluetooth connection and to enable hands-free communication through our special noise reduction technology Super Comfortable design: The Cushioned Ear Muffs are made of artificial leather so that you can wear them for extended time with comfort. The Headset is foldable for easy storage and travel. Great for use by Unisex Kids, Teens and Adults. Built-in microphone: For clear hands-free calling. Enjoy Speaking and Talking Handsfree A highly sensitive microphone that is perfect for capturing clear audio, Micro SD card support: And volume and pause/play functions , allows you to conveniently Listen to Your Favorite Music Audio books, and Podcasts. Brand - Gabba Goods ** Color - Lavender ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Impedance - 26 Ohm **

banner_details:
The banner features a modern, two-tone vertical split layout with the left half in a rich purple gradient and the right half in a soft lavender gradient. A pair of sleek, over-ear headphones is prominently displayed on the right, giving a stylish, high-tech feel to the design. On the left, the large bold heading (`heading`) is placed near the top, followed by a sleek tagline (`tagline`) in a futuristic font. Below, a concise feature list (`description`) neatly highlights key benefits. The price (`price`) stands out in bold, tech-inspired typography. A rounded button (`cta_background` + `cta`) at the bottom invites engagement with a clear CTA.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Purple: #59429A
- Lavender: #E6DDFF
- Soft Lilac Gradient: #9E8AD3
- White: #FFFFFF
- Accent Stroke: #8A70D0
product_color: The product image showcases sleek, modern headphones in a soothing lavender shade. A soft gradient of purples is used, blending lighter hues on the ear cups and headband with slightly deeper, matte purples in the cushioning, creating a harmonious yet highlighted look. The light reflects subtly off the glossy surfaces, enhancing visual appeal and accentuating contours. The buttons are delicately contrasted with a lighter pinkish-lavender, subtly drawing the eye. The ideal color palette for an advertisement banner includes: Lavender Mist (#C6B4E5), Soft Lilac (#B49DDC), Deep Lavender (#8C75BA), Light Periwinkle (#D1C4E9), and Pale Pink (#F0D6F8).
